1533180.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 4
1533180.description:
Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 4 makes it easier than ever to integrate a new female character into your project by offering matching sprites, facesets, portraits and battlers.
Inspired by both classic fantasy elements and a modern manga aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources!

Features:
  • 8 walking character sprites.
  • 104 front-facing battlers (static, 13 variations per character × 8 = 104 ).
  • 8 side-view battlers (animated).

  • 64 images for facesets (8 emotions per character).

  • 64 portrait bust images (8 busts per character, with emotions).
  • BONUS: All of 8 characters with large-scale full-character artwork.
  • All of above comes with present (modern day) outfits!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker, not ok to sell commercially in other engines
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1533180.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
